NewsArticle.Title: Updates 01/25
NewsArticle.Content:
-A fix has been implemented for the board access exploit. We have kept a list of all players who have abused this exploit, and their accounts will be permanently blocked.
-Starting on 01/26, each Knight will have the ability to widdle a town official's clout by 10.
-On 01/26, the "Perfect Hairstyle" quest will be implemented at Suomi Village.
